data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Sultanpur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sultanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Sultanpur words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Sultanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Sultanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kumhar (Hindu traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, sanctify the 41,768 believers in Sultanpur and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Sultanpur, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sultanpur, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 3,797,100.

We estimate Sultanpur has 41,768 people who might know Jesus, 46,071 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,709,260 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Sultanpur.
